title: Categorical Data encoding techniques
description: Problem Statement:- A common task in machine learning pipelines is encoding categorical variables for a given algorithm in a format that allows as much useful signal as possible to be captured. We have to handle different types of categorical data columns using multiple techniques in order to get best results.  Lets begin. Types of categorical data given to us  binary features low- and high-cardinality nominal features low- and high-cardinality ordinal features (potentially) cyclical features
